name: FeatureCardTen
description: Timeline process flow feature section with numbered steps, alternating layout, and list items.

description.example: Everything you need to build and scale your business with confidence

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

id.note: Feature identifier displayed in numbered badge

description.example: Connect your existing tools and workflows seamlessly.

media.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc required, with optional imageAlt/videoAriaLabel

items.note: Array of list items with icon (LucideIcon) and text (string)

propsSchema.features: FeatureCard[] (required) - Array with id, title, description, media, items, reverse
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTen
    title="How It Works"
    description="Follow these simple steps to get started."
    tag="Process"
    tagIcon={Workflow}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        id: "1",
        title: "Sign Up",
        description: "Create your account in seconds.",
        media: { imageSrc: "/step1.jpg", imageAlt: "Sign up" },
        items: [
          { icon: Check, text: "Free to start" },
          { icon: Check, text: "No credit card required" }
        ],
        reverse: false
      },
      {
        id: "2",
        title: "Configure",
        description: "Set up your preferences.",
        media: { imageSrc: "/step2.jpg", imageAlt: "Configure" },
        items: [
          { icon: Settings, text: "Easy customization" }
        ],
        reverse: true
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Alternate reverse property for visual variety
Include relevant icons for list items
dont: Do not use without media for each feature
Do not use without list items
